channel.title: Railway tram breaks when you put it into reverse
channel.description: Right so in the railway section when you're going up the elevator which is surrounded in turrets I accidentally press reverse then suddenly it just stops right there, the tram but not the elevator and then it just goes onto its front side Pic Relevant: [img]https://scontent-b-lhr.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ash4/t1.0-9/10014584_839438986083224_1540880809_n.jpg[/img]
